alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Lincoln; Madison (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 4:19PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln, southeastern Garrard and southern Madison Counties through 445 PM EST... At 418 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Richmond to near Woodstock. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Lincoln, southern Madison and southeastern Garrard Counties, including the following locations... Crab Orchard, Caleast, Duluth, Peytontown, Bighill, Ottenheim, Broughtentown, Kingston, Buggytown and Cartersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
